feature.name: Feature                                 Identity
feature.summary: Uplink Frequency-Selective Scheduling feature improves both significant cell edge and

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.resourceAllocationStrategy
parameters.description: Defines the resource allocation strategy of the QoS Class Identifier                                 (QCI). Changes to this parameter take effect only if the Uplink                                 Frequency-Selective Scheduling and the QoS-Aware Scheduler features                                 are activated.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.srsAllocationStrategy
parameters.description: If set to  ACTIVATED, an attempt is made to allocate                                 sounding for a UE. If several Data Radio Bearers are setup towards                                 the UE with different QoS configurations, and the QoS configurations                                 have different QCI parameters, an algorithm using the priority                                 parameter in the QoS configuration resolves which QoS configuration                                 that defines sounding.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulSrsEnable
parameters.description: This parameter controls when sounding is enabled or not in a cell.                                 When enabled, cell resources are configured for sounding.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.ulSrsEnable
parameters.description: This parameter controls when sounding is enabled or not in a cell.                                 When enabled, cell resources are configured for sounding.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_CELL_NOISE_INTERFERENCE_PRB
parameters.description: Measurements of the accumulated interference power per PRB.  (In total 100 event parameters, one for each PRB.)

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_RADIO_CELL_NOISE_INTERFERENCE_PRB
events.description: Measurements of the accumulated interference power per PRB.  (In total 100 event parameters, one for each PRB.)

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011074 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011074 MO instance.
